video.title: Turbo FAST
video.synopsis: Join Turbo and his posse, the Fast Action Stunt Team. Filled with comedy, action and fun, this series amps it up to the extreme.

episodes.synopsis: Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane, stunt-filled obstacle course.
episodes.title: Crazy Fast

episodes.synopsis: White Shadow is invited to compete against his hero but doesn't realize the contest is fixed; Turbo must slow down to win a gecko lizard's challenge.
episodes.title: Dungball Derby / Ace of Race

episodes.synopsis: After a near-accident, Chet enters a dangerous pinball machine race; the crew must prevent sewer-surfing roaches from infesting the taco stand.
episodes.title: Bumperdome / Broaches

episodes.synopsis: The crew is summoned to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs; White Shadow is challenged to a match by three champion sumo-wrestler snails.
episodes.title: African Queen / Mega Snails

episodes.synopsis: Fire ants swarm the city and it's up to Burn to race their leader; the crew travels to Mississippi for a race in the swamp, but Skidmark goes missing.
episodes.title: Ants Ants Revolution / Clamsquatch

episodes.synopsis: Birds attack the city on the day Turbo unveils his new signature fragrance; a sheriff throws the team in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.
episodes.title: Turbo Stinks / Snails in Jail

episodes.synopsis: Turbo searches for an impostor who is pretending to be him all over town; invited to a fancy dinner party, Turbo discovers that he is on the menu.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair

episodes.synopsis: Sewer cockroaches challenge the team to a surfing contest during a relaxing day at the beach; Hardcase returns and vows to take revenge on Turbo.
episodes.title: Surf 'N Turf / Hardcase Returns

episodes.synopsis: While filming a commercial in Tokyo, a mysterious cricket challenges Turbo to a drift race, while the team explores the city and Chet gets lost.
episodes.title: Turbo Drift

episodes.synopsis: Turbo and Skidmark join an underground zip line race to uncover a conspiracy. / Whiplash enters the Tomato Games, competing against his former mentor.
episodes.title: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck's Back

episodes.synopsis: A rodent pirate challenges Turbo to a race on a cruise ship; an unconscious Turbo gets a new shell that the crew can operate by remote control.
episodes.title: Cruise Control / R/C Turbo

episodes.synopsis: After accidentally waking cicadas from hibernation, the crew must get them back to sleep; a celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe.
episodes.title: Curse of the Cicadas / Beat-A Fajita

episodes.synopsis: Turbo is excited to race on a section of freeway that's closed for construction; Burn breaks up with Chet when he forgets her birthday.
episodes.title: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned

episodes.synopsis: A fortune-telling gypsy moth predicts doom for Whiplash; Skidmark tries to change his crazy behavior by rewiring his brain with a special helmet.
episodes.title: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia

episodes.synopsis: Chet becomes obsessed with opening a stubborn tomato juice can; Turbo adopts a toad for charity but the toad becomes an obnoxious house guest.
episodes.title: No Can Do / Adopt-A-Toad

episodes.synopsis: Smoove Move is embarrassed when his nerdy brother comes to visit; Skidmark causes a panic when he hunts a snail-eating goldfish at a fancy party.
episodes.title: Buster Move / Gills

episodes.synopsis: Turbo and Whiplash meet a strange tick who may be out to harm Turbo; when the crew starts a prank war, Chet is nervous that he's the next target.
episodes.title: Terror of Tickula / Prank'd

episodes.synopsis: White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to get back on the track; the crew meets a strange new creature while playing detectives.
episodes.title: Over Shadowed / Beware the Chickipede

episodes.synopsis: Turbo competes in a crazy underground race through a mall; Tito trades in his food truck for a tank and goes on a wild ride through the city.
episodes.title: Mall is Well / Taco Tank

episodes.synopsis: Shadow and Skidmark embark on a perilous adventure through the zoo to rescue Deuce; Whiplash attempts to prevent the crew from meeting his parents.
episodes.title: Zoo Lander / Balloonatics

episodes.synopsis: Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose some shady bugs selling artificial ketchup; Turbo prepares to compete in an underground smack-talk contest.
episodes.title: The Packet Racket / Smack Me Down

episodes.synopsis: When Smoove Move becomes a world-famous pedicurist, fame goes to his head; the crew plans to retrieve their shells after hermit crabs steal them.
episodes.title: Smoovin' On Up / The Great Shell Robbery

episodes.synopsis: Chet's obsessed with tracking down a litterbug; the crew competes against each other in a dangerous obstacle course race to save a damselfly princess.
episodes.title: Chet vs. Dr. Disorder / Damselfly in Distress

episodes.synopsis: Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko; Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet.
episodes.title: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch

episodes.synopsis: Hardcase goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get revenge on Turbo; White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and has a streak of terrible luck.
episodes.title: Hardluck & Hardcase / To Bee or Not to Bee

episodes.synopsis: Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan during a visit to a racing convention; Turbo's old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.
episodes.title: Tur-Bros / The Snailman

episodes.synopsis: Fed up with the rowdy FAST crew, Chet challenges them to go without racing; Skid and Shadow must defend the clubhouse alone against Clip and Clap.
episodes.title: The Challenge / Home on Our Own

episodes.synopsis: Burn is forced to coach a lousy tetherball team -- and gets inspired by an old rival; White Shadow's karate skills are tested by a ninja stinkbug.
episodes.title: The Mighty Snails / Silent but Deadly

episodes.synopsis: Chet can't get him on a cereal box, so Turbo makes Ace Gecko his sports agent; Smoove Move competes in a ski race to prove his worth -- all for love.
episodes.title: Agent Ace / Smoove as Ice

episodes.synopsis: When a bad magic trick makes Chet disappear, Turbo and Burn work together to find him; A superhero hornet arrives in Turbotown and stirs up trouble.
episodes.title: The Disappearing Act / The Sting of Injustice

episodes.synopsis: Chet, Skidmark and Smoove Move bring swamp toad Marty on an adventure; The snails fumble taking care of a lost human child left at the taco stand.
episodes.title: The Treasure of Sierra Marty / Big Baby

episodes.synopsis: A mix-up puts the FAST crew on a rocket bound for outer space; The crew must work together to avoid space madness, debris … and a fiery re-entry.
episodes.title: Turboldly Go - Part 1 / Turboldly Go - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A prank leads to "crow pox" for the FAST snails, who make a treacherous climb to find a cure; Burn and her hippie sister try to end their rivalry.
episodes.title: Crow Pox / Faking Amends

episodes.synopsis: Whiplash tries to scare Deuce and Edward straight, but the plan backfires; After Turbo saves his life, Buster Move waits on Turbo's every need.
episodes.title: Deuce Is Wild / To Fire a Squire

episodes.synopsis: Skid unleashes an evil robot on Turbotown and has to get rid of the monster himself; Turbo falls for and betroths a head-eating mantis princess.
episodes.title: Maggotron / Love Hurts

episodes.synopsis: White Shadow is mistaken for a celebrity snail and kidnapped; Tito gets a foosball table which quickly becomes a soccer battle ground.
episodes.title: Ransom of White Shadow / Kicked Off

episodes.synopsis: Mel Shellman gets fired and crashes with the FAST crew, but he's so annoying they try to get him rehired; An old flame shows up, making Chet jealous.
episodes.title: The Day Mel Fell / Burn's Ex-Boo

episodes.synopsis: Whiplash takes on the toughest creature around in a MMA-style fight; When the FAST crew is abducted, Skidmark and his conspiracy club get on the case.
episodes.title: Tough as Snails / C.O.N.S.P.I.R.A.C.Y.

episodes.synopsis: Skidmark and White Shadow try to stop spring from coming by keeping a groundhog in his hole; Smoove loses the power behind his effortless cool.
episodes.title: Groundhog, Stay! / Gone Guys Gone
